price: 31. Oo aan harsi laheyn, waxnana ka tareyn ololka dabka.
arabic: لَّا ظَلِيلٖ وَلَا يُغۡنِي مِنَ ٱللَّهَبِ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: lā ẓalīlin walā yugh'nī mina al-lahabi
